body_html:
I checked the code and maybe found the reason.

This is because Env::MatchPath (What the tf.gfile.Glob will last use) has different behavior on Windows and Linux.
There is a related issue which was already closed
#15501

Maybe @snnn and @jart will have some suggestions?

body:
I checked the code and maybe found the reason.

This is because Env::MatchPath (What the tf.gfile.Glob will last use) has different behavior on Windows and Linux.
There is a related issue which was already closed 
[#15501](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/15501)

Maybe @snnn and @jart will have some suggestions?
